title: Minute movie masterpieces: 30 film classics in 30 minutes
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - United States - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - History

description: This compilation video gives a quick synopsis of 30 classic movies ranging from "Birth of a nation" to "A Star is born". It uses key clips and highlights from each film and a whirlwind narration from speed readers to deliver maximum plot content in the one minute available, before moving on to the next title. Written and edited by David Starns.
